memberdef.name: ccdExposure
memberdef.initializer: = cT.Input( name="raw", doc="Input exposure to process.", storageClass="Exposure", dimensions=["instrument", "exposure", "detector"], )

memberdef.name: camera
memberdef.initializer: = cT.PrerequisiteInput( name="camera", storageClass="Camera", doc="Input camera to construct complete exposures.", dimensions=["instrument"], isCalibration=True, )

memberdef.name: crosstalk
memberdef.initializer: = cT.PrerequisiteInput( name="crosstalk", doc="Input crosstalk object", storageClass="CrosstalkCalib", dimensions=["instrument", "detector"], isCalibration=True, minimum=0, # can fall back to cameraGeom )

memberdef.name: crosstalkSources
memberdef.initializer: = cT.PrerequisiteInput( name="isrOverscanCorrected", doc="Overscan corrected input images.", storageClass="Exposure", dimensions=["instrument", "exposure", "detector"], deferLoad=True, multiple=True, lookupFunction=crosstalkSourceLookup, minimum=0, # not needed for all instruments, no config to control this )

memberdef.name: bias
memberdef.initializer: = cT.PrerequisiteInput( name="bias", doc="Input bias calibration.", storageClass="ExposureF", dimensions=["instrument", "detector"], isCalibration=True, )

memberdef.name: dark
memberdef.initializer: = cT.PrerequisiteInput( name='dark', doc="Input dark calibration.", storageClass="ExposureF", dimensions=["instrument", "detector"], isCalibration=True, )

memberdef.name: flat
memberdef.initializer: = cT.PrerequisiteInput( name="flat", doc="Input flat calibration.", storageClass="ExposureF", dimensions=["instrument", "physical_filter", "detector"], isCalibration=True, )

memberdef.name: ptc
memberdef.initializer: = cT.PrerequisiteInput( name="ptc", doc="Input Photon Transfer Curve dataset", storageClass="PhotonTransferCurveDataset", dimensions=["instrument", "detector"], isCalibration=True, )

memberdef.name: fringes
memberdef.initializer: = cT.PrerequisiteInput( name="fringe", doc="Input fringe calibration.", storageClass="ExposureF", dimensions=["instrument", "physical_filter", "detector"], isCalibration=True, minimum=0, # only needed for some bands, even when enabled )

memberdef.name: strayLightData
memberdef.initializer: = cT.PrerequisiteInput( name='yBackground', doc="Input stray light calibration.", storageClass="StrayLightData", dimensions=["instrument", "physical_filter", "detector"], deferLoad=True, isCalibration=True, minimum=0, # only needed for some bands, even when enabled )

memberdef.name: bfKernel
memberdef.initializer: = cT.PrerequisiteInput( name='bfKernel', doc="Input brighter-fatter kernel.", storageClass="NumpyArray", dimensions=["instrument"], isCalibration=True, minimum=0, # can use either bfKernel or newBFKernel )

memberdef.name: newBFKernel
memberdef.initializer: = cT.PrerequisiteInput( name='brighterFatterKernel', doc="Newer complete kernel + gain solutions.", storageClass="BrighterFatterKernel", dimensions=["instrument", "detector"], isCalibration=True, minimum=0, # can use either bfKernel or newBFKernel )

memberdef.name: defects
memberdef.initializer: = cT.PrerequisiteInput( name='defects', doc="Input defect tables.", storageClass="Defects", dimensions=["instrument", "detector"], isCalibration=True, )

memberdef.name: linearizer
memberdef.initializer: = cT.PrerequisiteInput( name='linearizer', storageClass="Linearizer", doc="Linearity correction calibration.", dimensions=["instrument", "detector"], isCalibration=True, minimum=0, # can fall back to cameraGeom )

memberdef.name: opticsTransmission
memberdef.initializer: = cT.PrerequisiteInput( name="transmission_optics", storageClass="TransmissionCurve", doc="Transmission curve due to the optics.", dimensions=["instrument"], isCalibration=True, )

memberdef.name: filterTransmission
memberdef.initializer: = cT.PrerequisiteInput( name="transmission_filter", storageClass="TransmissionCurve", doc="Transmission curve due to the filter.", dimensions=["instrument", "physical_filter"], isCalibration=True, )

memberdef.name: sensorTransmission
memberdef.initializer: = cT.PrerequisiteInput( name="transmission_sensor", storageClass="TransmissionCurve", doc="Transmission curve due to the sensor.", dimensions=["instrument", "detector"], isCalibration=True, )

memberdef.name: atmosphereTransmission
memberdef.initializer: = cT.PrerequisiteInput( name="transmission_atmosphere", storageClass="TransmissionCurve", doc="Transmission curve due to the atmosphere.", dimensions=["instrument"], isCalibration=True, )

memberdef.name: illumMaskedImage
memberdef.initializer: = cT.PrerequisiteInput( name="illum", doc="Input illumination correction.", storageClass="MaskedImageF", dimensions=["instrument", "physical_filter", "detector"], isCalibration=True, )

memberdef.name: deferredChargeCalib
memberdef.initializer: = cT.PrerequisiteInput( name="cpCtiCalib", doc="Deferred charge/CTI correction dataset.", storageClass="IsrCalib", dimensions=["instrument", "detector"], isCalibration=True, )

memberdef.name: outputExposure
memberdef.initializer: = cT.Output( name='postISRCCD', doc="Output ISR processed exposure.", storageClass="Exposure", dimensions=["instrument", "exposure", "detector"], )

memberdef.name: preInterpExposure
memberdef.initializer: = cT.Output( name='preInterpISRCCD', doc="Output ISR processed exposure, with pixels left uninterpolated.", storageClass="ExposureF", dimensions=["instrument", "exposure", "detector"], )

memberdef.name: outputOssThumbnail
memberdef.initializer: = cT.Output( name="OssThumb", doc="Output Overscan-subtracted thumbnail image.", storageClass="Thumbnail", dimensions=["instrument", "exposure", "detector"], )

memberdef.name: outputFlattenedThumbnail
memberdef.initializer: = cT.Output( name="FlattenedThumb", doc="Output flat-corrected thumbnail image.", storageClass="Thumbnail", dimensions=["instrument", "exposure", "detector"], )

memberdef.name: outputStatistics
memberdef.initializer: = cT.Output( name="isrStatistics", doc="Output of additional statistics table.", storageClass="StructuredDataDict", dimensions=["instrument", "exposure", "detector"], )
